Name: Spaghetti Bolognese
Description: A classic Italian pasta dish with a rich meat sauce.
Instructions: 1. Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
2. In a pan, heat the olive oil and sauté the onions and garlic until softened.
3. Add the minced beef and cook until browned.
4. Stir in the canned tomatoes and simmer for 15-20 minutes.
5. Season with salt and pepper.
6. Serve the sauce over the spaghetti and top with Parmesan cheese.
